Headline: #79 79th Temporary Reroute at 79th/Racine
ShortDescription: 79 79th buses are temporarily rerouted via 79th, Racine, 76th, Halsted, 79th, and over normal route, due to: police activity near 79th/Racine.

Headline: Red Line Delays
ShortDescription: Red Line trains are running with residual delays following an earlier unauthorized person on the track. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Red Line trains are running with residual delays following an earlier unauthorized person on the track.

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
